About the job
Full-Stack Developer Internship
Maison 21G — Singapore
Maison 21G is a fast-growing French luxury perfumery house redefining how the world experiences scent. Through cutting-edge personalization, natural haute-couture ingredients, and immersive digital tools, we are transforming the way people and brand create their own signature scent—online and offline.
We are looking for a Full-Stack Developer Intern to join our expanding digital team in Singapore. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to real production systems for a luxury brand operating across Asia, the Middle East, Europe, and the US.
High-performing interns may be offered a full-time position upon completion of the internship.
About the Role
This hands-on internship places you at the heart of our digital ecosystem. You will collaborate with an international, multidisciplinary team to evolve our e-commerce platform, enhance our fragrance configuration tools, and shape the online journey of scent lovers worldwide.
Minimum internship duration: 5–6 months

Key Responsibilities
Backend Development
Maintain and optimize backend services built with Django, Celery, and Python
Operate within a live production stack featuring PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Linux, and GitLab
Build data pipelines, run analyses, and generate insights using Python and SQL

Frontend Development
Develop and refine features using React.js, SCSS, and Material UI (MUI)
Contribute to state management using Zustand or Redux
Support marketing micro-interactions and front-end updates via Webflow

Systems & Integrations
Learn and assist with CI/CD pipelines, deployment workflows, and technical troubleshooting
Support integrations for payments (Stripe, PayPal), logistics (DHL APIs), analytics (GA4, GTM), and ERP (Odoo)
Participate in architecture discussions, performance optimization, and UX/UI improvements

What You’ll Gain
Conversion opportunity: Outstanding interns may transition to a full-time engineering role
Real impact: Contribute to features used by a global luxury audience
Modern tech stack exposure: Django, React, Docker, CI/CD, PostgreSQL, Redis
International collaboration: Work with teams across Paris, Singapore, Dubai, and beyond
Creative innovation: Build digital tools at the intersection of technology, luxury, and craftsmanship
High-growth environment: Young, dynamic team with ample room for ownership and initiative
Ideal Candidate
Strong foundation in Python and JavaScript
Curious about both backend architecture and frontend experiences
Passionate about beautiful, functional, elegant digital products
Autonomous, proactive, and committed to clean, maintainable code
Excited to work in a fast-paced luxury-tech environment

Monthly stipend: SGD 1,000
Presence in Singapore is indispensable with valid student visa to work in Singapore
